emenma jathika lotharayi mandalaye wasana sampatha lotharayiye anugrahayen thawath wattu sankirnayak sandaha mul gal thabana ladi.ee diwangatha amathya da.mu.dasanayaka mahathage aaradhanayen jathika lotharayi mandalaye sabhapathi priyantha kariyapperuma mahatha athini.2006 marthu masa 11 wani dina thabana lada ema mul gala wenuwen sthapanaya kara athi sihiwatana palakaye sandahan wanne saukhya sampanna janathawak bihi kirima sandaha thawath wattu sankirnayak idiwana bawaki.namuth ewani wattu sankirnayak methek idiwi natha.idi kirim athara maga nawatha athi ema sankirnaya wal bihi wemin pawathi.
